description:
In this course, author Anastasia McCune provides the basic building blocks a
designer, even one whoâ€™s never touched Flash, needs to create animation
projects or build a web presence. This course works for all Creative Suite
versions of Flash and demonstrates how to create graphics, transform them to
symbols, instantly move and morph objects with tweens, and incorporate text
and audio. The final chapters address slightly more advanced topics such as
adding links and play/pause controls to a project with ActionScript, as well
as how to embed video into a Flash project.
title: Up and Running with Flash Professional
